title: Downtown San Francisco Historic Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drink
description:
Escape to the heart of Downtown San Francisco with an elegant stay, boasting the city's very best sights right on your doorstep - including nearby Union Square and the famous Alcatraz Island just a short ferry away.

This historic architectural marvel is anything but ordinary, with an interior showcasing the very best of modern-day San Francisco sophistication. Throughout, The Clift's quintessential Art Deco flair perfectly reflects the hotel's storied past, dating back to 1915.

Raise a glass in the richly panelled Redwood Room, indulge in a menu inspired by San Francisco's history and open-hearted culture at Fredericks, enjoy access to Peloton bikes in the fitness centre or simply unwind in the hotel's thoughtfully appointed guest rooms.
offer_address: 495 Geary St, San Francisco, CA 94102, United States

vendor_name: Timbri Hotel San Francisco, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Grand Opening: Stylish Downtown San Francisco Haven with Daily Breakfast & Hotel Dining Credit
description:
Step into the magic of San Francisco at this stylish hideaway that's anything but ordinary. Tucked in buzzing downtown, Timbri Hotel San Francisco, Curio Collection by Hilton features a cool, artsy ambience, jaw-dropping city views and a vibe that screams 'quintessential San Francisco' from the moment you walk through the door.

When hunger strikes, the rooftop Rise Over Run has you covered with Mediterranean goodness, while after hours, the Dark Bar weaves its magic - an intimate hideaway with expert cocktails in a seductive setting. Steps from cable cars, boutiques and those iconic hills, you're in the best location to dive into authentic San Francisco. Come as a visitor, leave feeling like a local.
location_description: Timbri Hotel San Francisco, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 33 Turk Street, San Francisco, California 94102, United States

description:

Located within the city’s bustling Theater District, you'll be perfectly placed to discover San Francisco's best. Shop 'til you drop at Union Square's vast collection ranging from designer stores to craft boutiques, hop on a trademark cable car and trundle your way around the city, or take an unmissable tour to Alcatraz.

description: Experience Fairmont’s world-renowned brand of five-star luxury with a stay at the legendary Fairmont San Francisco. This iconic city hotel has enjoyed a prime location atop Nob Hill since 1907 and has played host to Hollywood stars, celebrities, politicians and presidents throughout its storied history. Stay in a beautifully appointed guest room with daily buffet breakfast at the grand Laurel Court Restaurant, nightly free-flow wine hour, included amenity fee and all the sights of San Francisco at your fingertips.

description: Get lost in downtown San Francisco's culture and vibrant energy with an elegant stay right in the heart of it all. When you're not exploring the city, grab a cocktail and some small bites at the hotel's sophisticated Dark Bar, or take in panoramic city vistas from the rooftop bar and solarium Rise Over Run, serving delicious drinks, appetisers, and even better views. Top off your stay with a relaxing spa treatment from the comfort of your room overlooking the city skyline.

title: San Francisco Stylish Stay on Buzzing Market Street with Daily Breakfast at Acclaimed Restaurant
description:
Experience the urban wonders of San Francisco from the heart of the vibrant SoMa district with a stay at the stylish Hotel Zelos. Located within the historic Pacific Building, this is where storied opulence and modern luxury meet. Within the hotel, be tempted by creative cocktails and acclaimed fare at the hotel's bar and restaurant, Dirty Habit.

Beyond the hotel, you're perfectly positioned to explore the city's many treasures with vibrant shopping, dining and entertainment on your doorstep. A short stroll will take you to the renowned San Francisco Museum of Modern Art, while the bustling Union Square, with its high-end boutiques and charming cafes, is also within easy reach.

title: San Francisco Family-Friendly Retreat in the Heart of Fisherman's Wharf with Daily Resort Credit
description:
Discover the vibrant energy of San Francisco from this playful base in the heart of Fisherman's Wharf. Just steps from the city's celebrated waterfront, this contemporary retreat offers effortless access to iconic attractions, including Pier 39's playful sea lions, immersive exhibits at The Exploratorium and colourful marine life at Aquarium of the Bay.

After exploring famous cable car routes and soaking up Golden Gate views, return to the hotel’s heated outdoor pool or enjoy a relaxed drink at CAZBAR. Let the little ones unwind in the Game Zone, featuring arcade games, foosball tables and board games, before meeting back up for the hotel's nightly milk and cookie hour.

vendor_name: Staypineapple, An Elegant Hotel, Union Square San Francisco

description:

As the gateway to the city's most vibrant district, Union Square is the ideal location to start your city explorations. Promising an out-of-the-ordinary stay and offering glamorous touches like signature Pineapple treats in the afternoon, extra comfortable beds and outstanding service, this elegant hotel will take you close to all the city has on offer - from charming cable cars to the Golden Gate Bridge, cool restaurants and bars and the iconic districts of Telegraph Hill, Embarcadero and SoMa.

Your boutique city escape includes daily grab'n'go breakfast, a market welcome hamper filled with locally-sourced snacks including artisan crackers, cheese, chocolate and more, daily amenity fee including in-room coffee and tea, unlimited bottled water and high-speed, wireless Wi-Fi, a nightly drink per person and a leisurely late 2pm checkout.

description:
Groove to the off-kilter melody and bohemian charm of the Golden City with a rockstar-worthy stay at this iconic San Francisco sojourn. Nestled in the heart of the city, this edgy retreat is a stone’s throw from vibrant Union Square, the historic Haight-Ashbury district and the delicious eats of Chinatown.

After a day of exploration, retreat to this haven, where a symphony of style is inspired by some of music’s most iconic movers and shakers. Indulge in a tasty feed at PLS on Post, the onsite spot for burgers, shakes and beer, or enjoy a light bite and quick espresso at the funky Zeppelin Café.
offer_address: 545 Post Street, San Francisco, California 94102, United States

title: Landmark San Francisco Escape overlooking Bay Bridge with Daily Breakfast & Iconic Revolving Club Lounge Access
description:
Experience San Francisco's history in motion with a stay at this landmark hotel overlooking the city's spectacular bay. Part of the San Francisco skyline since 1973 - yet gloriously revamped and reimagined in 2023 - Hyatt Regency San Francisco is still one of the city's best stays, with its Embarcadero location providing easy access to the city's beloved Ferry Building.

Your stay includes access to the famous rotating Regency Club Lounge. Reopened only to Regency Club guests in 2024 after a 17-year hiatus, this unique space offers breathtaking panoramic views of the bay, Bay Bridge, and the San Francisco skyline - an experience you won’t find anywhere else in the world.

Upon arrival, you'll step into the world’s largest hotel lobby, a 42,000-square-foot space that’s gained fame in two Hollywood blockbusters. Tucked within is the stylish Eclipse Kitchen & Bar, where you can enjoy delicious Californian cuisine, along with a convenient grab-and-go market for quick bites.
offer_address: 5 Embarcadero Center, San Francisco, California 94111, United States of America

vendor_name: Staypineapple, An Elegant Hotel, Union Square San Francisco

description:
Located in the heart of Fisherman's Wharf, this hotel wraps you in nautical-inspired elegance with its maritime-designed accommodations and brass-meets-blues decor. Beyond your stylish room, you'll find the happening Bar Zoe with craft cocktails and the seriously delicious Pescatore Trattoria serving up Italian fare that'll make your taste buds dance. Start each day with freshly brewed coffee in the lobby, get cosy with nightly s'mores and make the most of complimentary bike rentals, all included in your waived destination fee.

Step out to discover San Francisco's most iconic attractions, including the heritage cable cars and the famous Pier 39 sea lions (yes, they're as entertaining as everyone says). Ghirardelli Square's chocolate heaven is just a 10-minute stroll away, while Lombard Street's crazy curves and Alcatraz ferry tours are practically on your doorstep.

title: Creative San Francisco Luxury in the Heart of the City's Vibrant SoMa District
description:
Soak up the sights of cosmopolitan San Francisco from the sophisticated yet creative Hotel Zetta, a cultural hub nestled in the famously cool SoMa (South of Market) district - moments from myriad museums, restaurants and the city's popular Union Square.

As the gateway to the city's fashion and culture, SoMa is the ideal location for urban adventurers. Head to the internationally acclaimed San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA), cheer on the Giants at a baseball game or delve into the district's infamous history with a stroll along the Barbary Coast Trail. Venture a little further to explore iconic San Fran attractions such as the Golden Gate Bridge or bustling Fisherman's Wharf - only a 15-minute taxi ride away.

After a day of exploration, retreat to one of the hotel's distinctive bars - unwind at the traditional lobby bar or intimate cocktail lounge, Marianne's, or check out the high-tech games with a drink in hand at The Playroom. Each space welcomes you with innovative art installations, graffiti murals and recycled fixtures, reflective of the creative city beyond its walls. Promising a luxurious, amenity-rich stay with glamorous touches like Amazon Alexa Voice Assistants, Illy espresso coffee machines and sumptuous linen, this elegant hotel is an urban retreat in one of the USA's most exciting cities.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Feel like a VIP with an **upgrade to the next best room type**, subject to availability
- With **waived hotel facility fees**, you can enjoy a wide range of benefits including a welcome drink, 24-hour fitness centre access, high-speed Wi-Fi and more
- Toast your escape in the comfort of your own room with **daily US$10 minibar credit** per room (for stays of 3+ nights)

**Travelling with family or friends?** Choose the spacious Deluxe Group Upgrade with two plush double beds for up to four people.
offer_address: 55 Fifth Street San Francisco CA 94103 United States

description:

Housed in a historical Spanish Colonial design masterpiece, Hotel Spero is within walking distance to the most sought-after central city attractions including Union Square, Transamerica Pyramid, the San Fransisco Cable Car Museum and endless noteworthy stores and restaurants.

Inside, you’ll find the perfect fusion of vintage opulence and modern elegance from the historic grand lobby to the top-of-the-line fitness centre. After a day of exploring the city, mill over innovative American cuisine or end the evening with handcrafted cocktails and locally brewed beers at Jasper’s Corner Tap & Kitchen - an upscale gastropub known for its elegant yet easy-going setting.

vendor_name: Staypineapple, An Elegant Hotel, Union Square San Francisco
title: Top-Rated San Francisco Escape in the Heart of Downtown near Union Square
description:
Soak up the sights of cosmopolitan San Francisco at Staypineapple, An Elegant Hotel. Promising an out-of-the-ordinary stay, this stylish launchpad nestled near Union Square offers a luxe experience that is totally unique. From the moment you step through the door, you’ll be charmed by its classy décor, curated art collection, friendly staff willing to go the extra mile and the brand's cheeky signature yellow touches; from pineapple-shaped welcome cookies to emblazoned phone chargers and embroidered pillows. Visit Pineapple Bistro & Bar and order yourself a signature cocktail before hitting the town, then borrow a beach cruiser bicycle and cycle around or simply spend your time exploring one of the world’s most amazing cities on foot.

Housed in a historic building, smack-bang in the thick of it, the hotel affords easy access to a plethora of attractions, boutiques, cafés, theatres and parks. You'll be steps from the instantly recognisable cable cars and in close proximity to Market Street, the Golden Gate Bridge, and the iconic districts of Chinatown, Telegraph Hill, Embarcadero and SoMa. This chic hotel received a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, placing it among the top 10% of properties worldwide on the review site.
offer_address: 580 Geary St San Francisco 94102 CA USA

title: Upscale San Francisco Escape Overlooking Fisherman's Wharf with Standout Onsite Restaurant
description: Discover San Francisco at the upscale Kimpton Alton Hotel-Fisherman's Wharf, an IHG Hotel, an elevated retreat overlooking both the shimmering bay and twinkling city lights. Explore the iconic landmarks before returning to enjoy a cocktail at Abaca Bar and restaurant, run by Chef Francis Ang, whose specialty contemporary Filipino-Californian fusion cuisine earned the restaurant a place on the New York Times' Best Restaurants List 2022.
location_description: Kimpton Alton Hotel - Fisherman's Wharf, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2700 Jones Street, San Francisco, California 94133, United States

title: Eclectic Art-Inspired San Francisco Escape near Vibrant Union Square
description:
Awaken your creative soul at a luxurious San Francisco launchpad that defies the norm: Hotel Emblem San Francisco - an audaciously expressive hotel inspired by some of the world’s greatest writers, artists, poets and rabble-rousers. Every corner is designed to spark the imagination, from bottled cocktails delivered to your door to the book-filled Writer’s Alcove in the lobby and the quirky guestrooms, where colours and patterns play.

Standing loud and proud on the intersection of iconic neighbourhoods Nob Hill, Union Square and the glitzy Theater District, this eclectic haven offers easy access to San Fran's most storied landmarks and locations. Follow a self-guided tour from the hotel's Underground Concierge to find under-the-radar local sights that will ignite your curiosity. Take that iconic snap as you gaze upon the glorious Golden Gate Bridge, treat your tastebuds to some freshly caught crab at Fisherman's Wharf or roll through the tree-lined streets on a classic cable car and trolley hop through the city.

After days filled with exploring, hang out at the hotel and spark conversation over handcrafted cocktails in the sleek Obscenity Bar & Lounge, hire a selection of unorthodox amenities - from tarot cards to record players, colouring books to meditation bowls - or sit back and record your experiences on the lobby typewriter.
offer_address: 562 Sutter Street San Francisco, CA 94102 United States

description:

title: San Francisco Heritage Luxury in Prestigious Nob Hill with Dining Credit
description:
From clam chowder and sea lions at the pier to the fabled Alcatraz, colourful Painted Ladies and vintage cable cars: soak up the unforgettable sights of San Francisco at one of the city’s most loved hotels, Stanford Court. A modern millennial beacon of luxe with a heritage twist, the hotel pays tribute to the rich history and legacy of the building's past (dating back to 1876) through artistic expressions with a truly San Fran 'boom town' spirit. Each of its 393 stylish rooms and suites infuses traditional luxury with contemporary comfort and mid-century inspiration for the modern mavericks and mavens.

Sitting at the only intersection of San Francisco’s legendary cable car lines and boasting skyline vistas of a city on the edge of innovation, Stanford Court offers an ideal mix of character, culture, technology and style; all the while maintaining the exclusivity and intimacy of a boutique hotel. Home to forward-looking wellness amenities including a state-of-the-art gym, an in-house art curation program, tech library, the stylish SC Bar & Lounge and Commons Cafe, this is a unique tech-savvy experience in the heart of San Fran.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Indulge with **US$25 drinks and dining credit** per room, per stay
- Take your time on your final day with **6pm super-late checkout**
- **Waived facility fees**, covering Wi-Fi, bicycle rental and more

**Suite Upgrade**: Experience ultimate San Francisco luxury when you upgrade to a Suites | Enterprise with separate living room and skyline views.

title: San Francisco Creative Boutique Hotel by Union Square with Designer Restaurant & Bar
description: Dive into the heart of San Francisco with a stay at the creative Hotel Zetta. title: Elegant San Francisco Self-Contained Apartments Near Fisherman’s Wharf
description:
Experience the charm of the City by the Bay with a stay at these five-star apartments, perfectly positioned near the bustling Fisherman’s Wharf. Relax in spacious, modern one-, two- or three-bedroom apartments, and indulge in exquisite dishes at McCormick & Kuleto's Seafood & Steaks, offering stunning panoramic views of the iconic waterfront.

Step outside to explore the vibrant Fisherman’s Wharf, renowned for its seafood stalls, famous sourdough bakeries and lively street scene. Take a leisurely stroll to Pier 39, or immerse yourself in culture with a visit to the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art to discover a world-class collection of awe-inspiring masterpieces.
offer_address: 900 North Point Street, San Francisco, California 94109, United States

title: Elegant San Francisco Landmark Luxury on Prestigious Nob Hill with 6pm Late Checkout
description:
Find the best of San Francisco at your fingertips with a stay at the contemporary and character-filled Huntington Hotel. The historic property, established in 1924, perches on prestigious Nob Hill, overlooking the green space of Huntington Park, Union Square and iconic city skyline. Just steps from the stately Grace Cathedral, with a cable car stop right outside, it couldn’t be closer to all the downtown action.

While it’s perfectly placed to explore San Francisco, the grand hotel has plenty to keep you occupied without walking out of the beautifully restored lobby. Its 134 rooms and suites are some of the most spacious in the city and feature traditional and modern styling inspired by the opulence of Singapore Straits Chinese (Peranakan) heritage. Sign up for a day or two of pampering at the award-winning, three-level Nob Hill Spa, where expertly trained therapists offer massages and more in one of 10 treatment rooms, while saunas, steam rooms and an infinity pool are on hand for hours of relaxation. Once you’ve found bliss, venture to the locally renowned Big 4 Restaurant for upscale American cuisine in a cosy setting, reminiscent of days gone by. Vintage leather chairs, dark wood panels and 19th-century Californian memorabilia are accompanied by live piano performances for an elegant escape every evening.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions**

- Enjoy every second of your stay with **6pm super-late checkout**
- **Waived daily facilities fee** with morning coffee, turndown service and more

**One-Bedroom Suite Upgrade**: Stretch out across the spacious One-Bedroom Suite, complete with a king bedroom, separate dining and living spaces, and a luxuriously appointed bathing room.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Choose a Deluxe Double Upgrade for up to four guests.
offer_address: 1075 California St, San Francisco, CA 94108, United States
